Eight bodies wash ashore in southern TurkeyEight bodies washed ashore in southern Turkey in the past six days and most of them may be from a lost migrant ship sailing toward Cyprus from the Lebanese-Syrian coast, according to broadcaster Haberturk and the local governor's office. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:24:38 GMT EIWCAV7G6NMPPFFWX6TYTJYSQE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eight-bodies-wash-ashore-southern-turkey-2024-01-22/Reuters世界中东地区
UN racism rapporteur criticises France's contested immigration billA fiercely contested immigration bill violates France's constitutional commitment to equality and liberty, the U.N. special rapporteur on racism said, amid nationwide protests against the legislation that is backed by far-right lawmakers. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:18:59 GMT CBO3U3AIQBPUPPN5YNTG7ORLPA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-racism-rapporteur-criticizes-france-contested-immigration-bill-2024-01-22/Layli Foroudi世界欧洲
Netanyahu to Gaza hostage kin: Hamas has not made a solid deal offerIsrael Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu pushed back on Monday after speculation that a new release of Gaza hostages was in the works, saying Israel was taking an unspecified initiative in the absence of an offer by the Palestinian militant group Hamas. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:13:53 GMT 6E6BYMSBTJITVPRPWYV7TOHF2M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-gaza-hostage-kin-hamas-has-not-made-solid-deal-offer-2024-01-22/Reuters世界中东地区
Four survivors of Russian plane crash in Afghanistan in ‘good health’ says TalibanFour survivors of a crash in northern Afghanistan of a charter plane on its way to Moscow were in good health, the Taliban administration said on Monday. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:05:32 GMT VJBAPG6LLVPKNGTYODQYCFKLZU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/four-survivors- Russian-plane-crash-afghanistan-good-health-says-taliban-2024-01-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia is acting to thwart Ukrainian attacks on civilians, infrastructure -KremlinRussia is taking all "necessary measures" to defend its citizens and key infrastructure from Ukrainian attacks, the Kremlin said on Monday, a day after Moscow accused Kyiv's forces of killing 27 people in shelling of a Russian-held city in eastern Ukraine. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 11:59:42 GMT 2H3LSZRE6ROQJGSMLCHEGJDZYA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-is-acting-thwart-ukrainian-attacks-civilian-infrastruct-kremlin-2024-01-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: China lobbies countries to praise its rights record ahead of UN review - diplomatsChina has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 11:59:03 GMT JD7KYWHVCRKKTN5MVMQECW2X2A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-lobbys-countries-praise-its-rights-record-ahead-un-review-diplomats-2024-01-22/Emma Farge世界中国
Gaza hostage relatives burst into Israeli parliament, calls for action mountA group of relatives of Israelis held hostage by Palestinian gunmen in Gaza stormed a parliamentary committee session in Jerusalem on Monday, demanding that the lawmakers do more to try to free their loved ones. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:58:38 GMT QCF4VHPTBOH3CJNMFIMF4经验https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/relative-gaza-hostage-storm-israeli-parliament-panel-2024-01-22/Steven Scheer世界中东地区
Ukraine's Zelenskiy hails diaspora's support, proposes dual citizenshipPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy thanked Ukrainians abroad on Monday for their support during Russia's invasion, and proposed changing the constitution to allow dual citizenship. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:37:41 GMT UEWKNOPQHZNDNOCMEVFFSRCVD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-hails-diasporas-support-proposals-dual-citizenship-2024-01-22/Reuters世界欧洲
UN migration agency seeks $7.9 billion for migrant supportThe United Nations migration agency aims to raise $7.9 billion this year through a new funding push to bolster efforts to protect migrants, reduce displacement and expand avenues to migrate legally, it said on Monday. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:34:15 GMT SLUYTX5B4ZKHVFUZTIV5DDDKSU https://www.reuters.com/world/un-migration-agency-seeks-79-billion-migrant-support-2024-01-22/Ted Hesson世界
Iran's FM to visit Pakistan to rebuild ties after missile strikesPakistan said on Monday Iran's foreign minister will visit the country next week, signaling efforts to mend relations after the neighbours exchanged missile strikes last week at what they said were militant targets. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:18:04 GMT D46RKPDCJJJ3FG66XLO2KQMJ7A https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-foreign-minister-to-visit-pakistan-next-week-islamabad-says-2024-01-22/Gibran Peshimam世界
Israeli forces storm hospital as Khan Younis hit by bloodiest fighting of 2024Israeli forces, advancing deep into western Khan Younis in Gaza's bloodiest fighting of the new year so far, stormed one hospital and placed another under siege on Monday, cutting the wounded off from trauma care, Palestinian officials said. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:16:39 GMT Y76ULMXVCVJYVFBGHNHHUFRXOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tanks-cut-off-two-hospitals-new-storming-gaza-khan-younis-2024-01-22/Bassam Masoud, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams世界中东地区
